name: Dashboard Layout with Collapsible Sidebar
description: A responsive admin dashboard layout with collapsible sidebar navigation, fixed header, and fixed footer. Perfect for admin panels, SaaS applications, and data-driven interfaces.

aiAgentInstructions.summary: Implement a four-section dashboard layout (sidebar, header, content, footer) with collapsible sidebar functionality. The layout is framework-agnostic and should adapt to the user's chosen stack (React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, etc.) and styling approach (Tailwind, CSS Modules, Chakra UI, Material-UI, etc.).
keyFeatures: Fixed header that adjusts to sidebar state (64px height)
Fixed footer that adjusts to sidebar state (60px height)
Scrollable main content area with smooth transitions
Content area accounts for header and footer spacing
Full keyboard accessibility with ARIA labels
implementationSteps: 1. Create four main layout components: Sidebar, Header, Footer, and MainContent
2. Implement state management for sidebar collapse/expand
3. Add localStorage persistence for sidebar state
4. Implement mobile-responsive behavior with overlay mode
5. Position header and footer as fixed elements (top and bottom)
6. Adjust header and footer left position based on sidebar state
7. Add margin-top and margin-bottom to content area for header/footer spacing
8. Add smooth CSS transitions (300ms) for all state changes
9. Implement keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes
10. Style according to user's chosen CSS framework/methodology

react.stateManagement: useState for component state, useEffect for localStorage, Context API or props for sharing state

vue.stateManagement: ref() or reactive() for state, watch() for localStorage, provide/inject for sharing

tailwindCSS.description: Use utility classes with dynamic classes based on state
tailwindCSS.sidebarExample: class='fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 bg-gray-900 text-white transition-transform duration-300' :class="{'w-20': collapsed}"
tailwindCSS.headerExample: class='fixed top-0 h-16 transition-all duration-300' :class="{'left-64': !collapsed, 'left-20': collapsed}"
tailwindCSS.footerExample: class='fixed bottom-0 h-15 transition-all duration-300' :class="{'left-64': !collapsed, 'left-20': collapsed}"
tailwindCSS.key: Use transition utilities and conditional classes

cssModules.description: Scoped CSS classes with conditional class names
cssModules.approach: Define .sidebar, .sidebar.collapsed classes, toggle via className logic
cssModules.transitions: Use CSS transition property for smooth animations

styledComponents.approach: Pass collapsed prop and adjust styles dynamically
styledComponents.example: const Sidebar = styled.aside`width: ${props => props.collapsed ? '80px' : '280px'}; transition: width 300ms;`

chakraUI.components: Use Drawer (permanent variant on desktop, temporary on mobile), Box for content
chakraUI.approach: Leverage Chakra's Drawer component with variant prop

materialUI.components: Use MUI Drawer (persistent variant on desktop, temporary on mobile), AppBar for header
materialUI.approach: MUI Drawer with variant='permanent' on desktop, variant='temporary' on mobile

vanillaCSS.approach: Define classes with transitions, toggle via JavaScript
vanillaCSS.example: .sidebar { width: 280px; transition: width 300ms; } .sidebar.collapsed { width: 80px; } .header { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 280px; transition: left 300ms; } .header.sidebar-collapsed { left: 80px; } .footer { position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 280px; transition: left 300ms; } .footer.sidebar-collapsed { left: 80px; }

keyboardNavigation.sidebarItems: Tab to focus, Enter/Space to activate
keyboardNavigation.skipLink: Skip to content link for screen readers

screenReader.hiddenText: Hidden text for icon-only nav items in collapsed state

sidebar.background: Darker than content (for contrast) or white with border
sidebar.activeItem: Primary color background (10-20% opacity) or solid
sidebar.icons: Match text color or use primary color for active

footer.border: Subtle 1px border-top or light shadow on top
footer.links: Muted color, primary color on hover

commonVariations.topNavigation: Add secondary horizontal navigation below header
commonVariations.footerPlacement: Footer can be inside content area (scrolls with content) or fixed at bottom (always visible). Default is fixed at bottom.
commonVariations.stickyFooter: Footer sticks to bottom when content is short, scrolls when content is long

testingChecklist: Sidebar opens as overlay on mobile
Content area adjusts to sidebar state
Header stays fixed on scroll and adjusts to sidebar state
Footer stays fixed at bottom and adjusts to sidebar state
Footer is always visible even with minimal content
Content area has proper spacing for header (margin-top: 64px) and footer (margin-bottom: 60px)
User dropdown opens and closes correctly
No horizontal scroll when sidebar collapses
Responsive at all breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
No layout shift or flicker on load
aiImplementationPrompt: Create a responsive dashboard layout with a collapsible sidebar (280px expanded, 80px collapsed), fixed header (64px height), fixed footer (60px height), and scrollable content area. The sidebar should overlay on mobile (<768px) and persist its collapsed state in localStorage. Both header and footer should adjust their left position based on sidebar state (280px when expanded, 80px when collapsed on desktop). Content area should have margin-top: 64px and margin-bottom: 60px to account for fixed header and footer. Include smooth 300ms transitions, keyboard accessibility with ARIA labels, and active state highlighting for current page. Ensure no horizontal scroll when sidebar collapses. Adapt the implementation to use {{USER_FRAMEWORK}} with {{USER_STYLING_LIBRARY}}. Include mobile menu toggle, user dropdown, and notifications button in the header. Footer should contain copyright and navigation links.
